name: Magma (TheMorphy)
description:
Magma is a simple swipe-based casual game. She will keep you for hours! Drag and release to make your player jump and watch out for lava.

Game Features

🔥 Endless fun with procedurally generated levels

🔥 Plenty of customization options to make the character your own

🔥 Clean and cute art style for a simple and enjoyable experience

🔥 Simple controls focus to be fun and engage you

🔥 Smart Sharing will capture your triumphant highscore moment

Feedback is not only welcome but appreciated!
